newsitem.title: UK: S&P affirms Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank ratings.
newsitem.headline: S&P affirms Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank ratings.

text.p: Standard & Poor's said on Tuesday it affirmed its A/A1 counterparty ratings on Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank.
The affirmation is in response to DKB's recent announcement that it will report a net loss of 160 billion yen for the fiscal year ended March 31, 1997, the rating agency said.
S&P also confirmed DKB's senior debt rating of A, CD rating of A/A1 and CP rating of A1.
The agency affirmed the A senior debt rating of Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank Nederland.
The outlook is negative, reflecting Standard & Poor's continuing concerns about the asset quality problems of Japanese banks, the agency said.
